DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis physical therapy intervention foot ankle diabetic neuropathic individual would affect positively way walk , lower harmful force segment receive , associate mainly low range movement , muscle weakness loss sensation . DOC.brief_title: Influence Physical Therapy Foot Ankle Gait Individuals With Diabetic Neuropathy
DOC.detailed_description: In study , include subject diagnose diabetic neuropathy , age 45 65 year old . We aim assess effect physical therapy program biomechanics low limbs gait .
